attributes.action: Call an immediate General Election, we the people have no confidence in this Government, and demand the right to select your successors without further delay.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This Government has failed the citizens of the UK by any criteria.

Another sixteen months of this horrendous incompetence is simply unacceptable.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
